# Let's Get To Know Our Data!

---

**Load packages**

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

---

**Download the data**

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
grads <- read_csv("data/recent_grads.csv")
grads
```

---
**Get a glimpse of the data**

```{r, eval = FALSE}
glimpse(grads)
```

---
**Distribution of median salaries**

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
ggplot(data = grads, mapping = aes(x = Median)) +
	geom_histogram()
```

---
**Visualize median salaries by major categories**



---

**Distribution of Median salaries by major category**

```{r}
ggplot(data = grads, aes(x = Major_category, y = Median)) +
	geom_boxplot()
```

---

```{r}
ggplot(data = grads, aes(x = Major_category, y = Median)) +
	geom_boxplot() +
	coord_flip()
```

---

```{r}
library(forcats)

ggplot(data = grads, aes(x = fct_reorder(Major_category, Median), y = Median)) +
	geom_boxplot() +
	coord_flip()
```

---

```{r}
library(forcats)

ggplot(data = grads, aes(x = fct_reorder(Major_category, Median), y = Median)) +
	geom_boxplot() +
	coord_flip() +
	labs(x = "", y = "Median salary")
```

---

```{r}
library(forcats)
library(scales)

ggplot(data = grads, aes(x = fct_reorder(Major_category, Median), y = Median)) +
	geom_boxplot() +
	coord_flip() +
	labs(x = "", y = "Median salary") +
	scale_y_continuous(labels = dollar_format())
```
